thread.title: Little girl born with full head of hair spends two-and-a-half hours a DAY having locks washed and blow-dried – and she’s only ten weeks old!
thread.title_full: Little girl born with full head of hair spends two-and-a-half hours a DAY having locks washed and blow-dried – and she’s only ten weeks old!

author: hcrouch
title: Little girl born with full head of hair spends two-and-a-half hours a DAY having locks washed and blow-dried – and she’s only ten weeks old!
text:
Opinion 'HIGH MAINTENANCE' Little girl born with full head of hair spends two-and-a-half hours a DAY having locks washed and blow-dried – and she’s only ten weeks old! 
Amelia has her hair oiled, washed and blow dried every day to keep her mane in check By Hannah Crouch
